idea: GigHustle is an India focused platform for freelancers or contract workers to find jobs or projects. The services provided include, but are not limited to, IT & Web services, Finance, Marketing, Consultancy, Legal, etc. Looking at the ever explosive lay-off rates in India, we think it is a great platform for the people to have a source of side income.
name: GigHustle

idea: Working in the field for years, Chef Saurabh Gurjar, Amina Khan the hospitality enthusiasts, always had a forward-looking eye on the trends and infrastructure needs of Hotels of the future. name: DECHEFMECH LLP

idea: LEXGENUS SOLUTIONS LLP  provides professional support and services to startups, emerging and existing business; to support them proactively to meet challenges of factors influencing their Business Environment.  We provide services with our expert team in handling various business functions - Registration & Licensing of Business; Management and Administration; Human Resource, Customer & Public Relationship Management;  Compliance,  Intellectual Property Rights Services; Regulatory, Legal and others.
name: LEXGENUS SOLUTIONS LLP
